item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is William Pereira and I’m a Software Developer. The intend of this blog is to post some of my personal experiences and share my knowledge with people from around the word. Talking a little about me I like to think that I’m in a continuous search for my purpose in the world, either it would be working as a dev and writing chronicles about day-to-day knowledge or talking about my hobbies.
